ie.gmit.sw.base

Class GroupShingler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.base.GroupShingler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shingable

    public class GroupShingler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shingable
    Implementation of shingable for create a word group shingles.

    Considered only words and number, skip punctuation and white spaces, numbers are considered words and words appended to number are considered one word(e.g. neo07)

    The group of words are append and then the hash code of all the words appended together is returned.

    Author:
    Jose I. Retamal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupShingler(int groupSize)
      Create a group shingles that will produce shingles with selected size of words group.

      boolean hasLast()
      return true if this shingable have a last shingle after return all next shingles, last shingle would be of a smaller size than the normal ones.
      boolean hasNextShingle()
      Returns true if has another shingle to return from line
      int lastShingle()
      Return the last shingle, should be use after checking if there is a last.

    • Method Detail

      • addLine

        public boolean addLine(java.lang.CharSequence line)
        Add new line, new line can only be added after all shingles are taken from last or is the first.

        if there are still shingles to be taken will return false and line will not be added.

        Split line in strings that are individual words, then add then to the array of words.

        Specified by:
        addLine in interface Shingable
        Parameters:
        line - new line to add
        Returns:
        true if was added, false if there are still shingles to take from last

      • nextShingle

        public int nextShingle()
        Used for get the next shingle of the line.

        There should be check if there is a next shingle using hasNextShingle() before call. Throws NoSuchElementException if there is no next shingle.

        Specified by:
        nextShingle in interface Shingable
        Returns:
        the hash code of the next shingle

      • hasNextShingle

        public boolean hasNextShingle()
        Returns true if has another shingle to return from line
        Specified by:
        hasNextShingle in interface Shingable
        Returns:
        true if this shingable has another shingle to return

      • hasLast

        public boolean hasLast()
        return true if this shingable have a last shingle after return all next shingles, last shingle would be of a smaller size than the normal ones.

        Should be called only after all shingles have been taken(hasNextShingle() = false) , if not should throw a exception.

        This should be use for check if there is a last shingle after all lines have been added and all shingle have been taken.

        Specified by:
        hasLast in interface Shingable
        Returns:
        true if has a smaller size last shingle

      • lastShingle

        public int lastShingle()
        Return the last shingle, should be use after checking if there is a last.

        Should be called only after all shingles have been taken(hasNextShingle() = false) , if not should throw a exception.

        Should be called after check that there is a last shingle(hasLast()=true) if there is not last and is call should throw a exception.

        shingle.
        Specified by:
        lastShingle in interface Shingable
        Returns:
        the last smaller size shingle.
